str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To veil, cover the head. From kata and kalupto; to cover wholly, i.e. Veil.

word: let her hair be cut off.
parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To shear, cut the hair of; mid: I cut my own hair, have my hair cut. A primary verb; to shear.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Base, disgraceful. From the same as aischunomai; shameful, i.e. Base.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
To shear, cut the hair of; mid: I cut my own hair, have my hair cut. A primary verb; to shear.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Aorist Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To shave, shear, cut off the hair. From a derivative of the same as xulon; to shave or 'shear' the hair.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To veil, cover the head. From kata and kalupto; to cover wholly, i.e. Veil.
